xml:
Dovobet<tm tmtype="reg"/> ointment Indications and dose

Stable plaque psoriasis

To the skin

  • Adult

    Apply once daily for 4 weeks; if necessary, treatment may be continued beyond 4 weeks or repeated, on the advice of a specialist, apply to a maximum 30% of body surface, when different preparations containing calcipotriol used together, max. total calcipotriol 5 mg in any one week; maximum 15 g per day.

 Clinical medicinal product information Clinical medicinal product information
title: Dovobet ointment

adult.textContent: Apply once daily for 4 weeks; if necessary, treatment may be continued beyond 4 weeks or repeated, on the advice of a specialist, apply to a maximum 30% of body surface, when different preparations containing calcipotriol used together, max. total calcipotriol 5 mg in any one week; maximum 15 g per day.
